codePut:
DECLARE
BEGIN
IF :SPRTELE_PRIMARY_IND = 'Y' THEN 
UPDATE SPRTELE 
SET SPRTELE_PRIMARY_IND = 'N'
WHERE SPRTELE_PIDM = :parm_user_pidm;
END IF;
GB_TELEPHONE.p_update(
     p_pidm  => :parm_user_pidm,
     p_seqno => :SPRTELE_SEQNO, 
     p_tele_code  => :SPRTELE_TELE_CODE,
     p_phone_area => :SPRTELE_PHONE_AREA,
     p_phone_number => :SPRTELE_PHONE_NUMBER,       
     p_primary_ind  => :SPRTELE_PRIMARY_IND,
     p_data_origin  => 'OENR',
     p_user_id  => F_GetSpridenID(:parm_user_pidm),
     p_rowid  => :id   );

END;
codeDelete:
begin
update sprtele 
set sprtele_activity_date = sysdate,
    sprtele_status_ind = 'I',
    sprtele_data_origin = 'OENR',
    sprtele_user_id = :parm_user_pidm
where rowid = :id
and sprtele_pidm = :parm_user_pidm
     ;
end;
codeGet:
SELECT rowidtochar(T1.ROWID) "id",
  :parm_user_pidm as pidm, 
  T1.SPRTELE_SEQNO,
  T1.SPRTELE_TELE_CODE,
  STVTELE_DESC, 
  T1.SPRTELE_PHONE_AREA, 
  T1.SPRTELE_PHONE_NUMBER, 
  T1.SPRTELE_PRIMARY_IND
FROM SPRTELE T1
LEFT JOIN STVTELE ON STVTELE_CODE = T1.SPRTELE_TELE_CODE 
WHERE T1.SPRTELE_PIDM = :parm_user_pidm
AND T1.SPRTELE_STATUS_IND IS NULL
ORDER BY T1.SPRTELE_PRIMARY_IND ASC
codePost:
DECLARE 
seqno_out  sprtele.sprtele_seqno%TYPE:=NULL;
rowid_out  gb_common.internal_record_id_type:=NULL;
BEGIN
IF :SPRTELE_PRIMARY_IND = 'Y' THEN 
UPDATE SPRTELE 
SET SPRTELE_PRIMARY_IND = 'N'
WHERE SPRTELE_PIDM = :parm_user_pidm;
END IF;
GB_TELEPHONE.p_create(
     p_pidm  =>   :parm_user_pidm,
     p_tele_code => :SPRTELE_TELE_CODE,
     p_phone_area => :SPRTELE_PHONE_AREA,
     p_phone_number  =>:SPRTELE_PHONE_NUMBER,
     p_phone_ext => NULL,    
     p_status_ind => NULL,         
     p_atyp_code => NULL,    
     p_addr_seqno   => NULL,   
     p_primary_ind  => :SPRTELE_PRIMARY_IND,    
     p_unlist_ind   => NULL,    
     p_comment    => NULL,    
     p_intl_access  => NULL,     
     p_data_origin => 'OENR',   
     p_user_id  =>  F_GetSpridenID(:parm_user_pidm),    
     p_ctry_code_phone => NULL,  
     p_seqno_out  =>  seqno_out,
     p_rowid_out => rowid_out);
     
 END;
